description: ink on blue paper; profile view of figure with dark hair, mustache, and uniform collar and hat with a dripping syringe on cheek, facing PR; street scene in background; brick paved surface with a dog urinating into a vase in lower center; row of houses in lower left; two more houses behind the dog; a fire hydrant, ball and tea kettle in front of dog; tree on left edge with long haired figure extending out of the top of the tree; circular shapes and heads in ULQ; paper is mounted on a backing board
provenance: The artist; by descent to Thea Tenenbaum-Malferrari, Longmont, Colo.; given to MIA, 2017
title: The Good Policeman
